content: materials hook 3 5mm darning needle worsted weight size 4 medium yarn i used the red heart super saver yarn- aran and white embroidery floss- black and light pink the type of floss you would use for cross stitching stuffing safety eyes 8mm scissors wire brush blush makeup optional terms chain chain st stitch repeat * slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet two stitches together as one stitch to decrease
